definition: (name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Let M be a connected and compact homogeneous space.
sentences.chinese: 設M爲一連通的緊緻齊性空間。

sentences.english: Therefore it is necessary to test the variance homogeneity of the models.
sentences.chinese: 因此對迴歸模型的方差齊性檢驗是十分必要的。

sentences.english: In longitudinal data analysis, homogeneity of variance is a basic assumption.
sentences.chinese: 在縱向數據分析中，模型方差的齊性是一個基本假定。

sentences.english: The differences of the measurement data were compared with the homogeneity test of variances and t test.
sentences.chinese: 計量資料差異比較採用方差齊性分析和t檢驗。

sentences.english: In this paper, we extend their result to nonlinear regression .
sentences.chinese: 本文則討論加權非線性迴歸方差齊性的假設檢驗問題。

sentences.english: The data were analysed with G test of homogeneous in statistical binomial distribution.
sentences.chinese: 數據採用二項分佈齊性檢驗的G統計學方法分析。
